author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 45-year-old man was killed and another injured after a share auto upturned down a slope here at Bedakaanapalli on Monday. The victim K. Murugan of Dittampatty of Paapaarapatty was killed in the accident, while the driver of the auto suffered injuries.

According to the police, the auto was carrying three persons, when it lost control and skid down the road, upsetting multiple times here near Dinnakalani bus stand. Krishnagiri police have registered a case.
title: One killed in accident
